INSERT INTO t_permission_data (f_code, f_union_ident, f_permission_code, f_prod_code, f_module_code, f_out_of_range, f_check_rules, f_actived, f_deleted, f_createtime, f_updatetime) VALUES('s_laodan_addUserModule_pd_1623057184650', 'addUserModulequeenq_user', 'addUserModule', 'queen', 'q_user', false, 'if (env.Request.PostJson != null && env.Request.PostJson.Has("_items") && env.Request.PostJson._items.Count > 0){string user = env.Request.PostJson._items[0].User;string prod = env.Request.PostJson._items[0].Product;List<string> modules = new List<string>();if (Assert.IsSameOrgByUserCode(user)){for (int i=0; i<env.Request.PostJson._items.Count; i++) {dynamic item = env.Request.PostJson._items[i];if (user != item.User){return false;}if (prod != item.Product){return false;}modules.Add(item.Module);}}return Assert.IsHaveProductModulePermission(prod, modules.ToArray());}return false;', true, false, '2021-04-12', '2021-04-12');
